name: Paperspace
description: Paperspace (by DigitalOcean) offers dedicated GPUs including H100/HGX H100 and A100 with managed notebooks and workflows.

features.title: Gradient Notebooks
features.description: Interactive Jupyter notebooks with a free tier, pre-configured templates, and access to powerful GPUs.

features.title: Gradient Deployments
features.description: Serve machine learning models as scalable API endpoints.

features.title: Core Machines
features.description: High-performance virtual machines with a wide variety of NVIDIA GPUs for demanding workloads.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Features for teams to collaborate on projects, including shared drives and SSO.

features.title: Persistent Storage
features.description: Offers persistent storage that can be shared across different machines and notebooks.

features.title: API and CLI
features.description: Programmatic access to the Paperspace platform to automate workflows.

pros: User-friendly interface and easy to get started
Wide range of NVIDIA GPU options
Free GPU and CPU plans for notebooks
Strong community forum and extensive documentation
cons: Limited data center regions (US and Europe)
Some user reports of inconsistent customer support
Availability of high-end multi-GPU instances can be limited
The platform is undergoing changes after being acquired by DigitalOcean

gettingStarted.title: Create an Account
gettingStarted.description: Sign up for a Paperspace account. You can start with a free plan.

gettingStarted.title: Choose a Product
gettingStarted.description: Select the product that best fits your needs, such as Gradient Notebooks for interactive development or Core Machines for more control.

gettingStarted.title: Select a Template and Machine
gettingStarted.description: Choose a pre-configured template for your desired framework and select a GPU or CPU instance.

gettingStarted.title: Start Working
gettingStarted.description: Launch your machine or notebook and begin building, training, or deploying your AI applications.
